li.label: free mind
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always saw their body as nothing more than a vessel for their mind. [PAWN_pronoun] does not care about the gender, age or looks of a body.

li.label: sleever
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is used to changing sleeves like they are clothes. {Pawn_pronoun} doesnâ€™t care how often {Pawn_pronoun} switches his sleeves or what sleeve {Pawn_pronoun} is currently using.
